bill_title: to clarify the jurisdictional limits of the Bureau of Information and Telecommunications over matters entrusted to the Board of Regents.

bill_versions.bill_text: FOR AN ACT ENTITLED, An Act to clarify the jurisdictional limits of the Bureau of Information and Telecommunications over matters entrusted to the Board of Regents. BE IT ENACTED BY THE LEGISLATURE OF THE STATE OF SOUTH DAKOTA: Section 1. That chapter 1-33 be amended by adding thereto a NEW SECTION to read as follows: Notwithstanding any other provision of this chapter, the Bureau of Information and Telecommunications may exercise no oversight, control, or jurisdiction of any sort over the academic decisions of the Board of Regents affecting the selection, use, support, or location of any data processing, office systems technology, services, telecommunications equipment, or related technology. 750 copies of this document were printed by the South Dakota Legislative Research Council at a cost of $.015 per page. . Insertions into existing statutes are indicated by underscores. Deletions from existing statutes are indicated by overstrikes.

action_log.status_text: First read in House and referred to
Scheduled for Committee hearing on this date
